v1.3
- Fixed ability to bypass DisableCommands simply by making one letter a capital.
v1.2
- Allow op to use commands and bypass command block.
- Can now set custom messages for
- Command Deny Message
- Permission Deny Message
- Already Forbidden Message
- Not Forbidden Message
- New Command /disablecommands reload to reload configuration.
- New Permission disablecommands.reload
v1.1
- Updated to 1.7.2
- Added Metrics.
- Added autoupdate.
v1.0.1
